title: hey @riot
body: Can we have a mean girl?...we have Taliyah shes like the "natural/spiritual girl" and Lux the "sweet/cheerful girl", I need the Regina George.

replies.body:
funnily,one of Taliyahs early concepts was a "spite mage",basically a female mage who was always salty and used negative energy or something like that.
I really hope they go back to that concept and flesh it out a bit more,cause I think it sounds hilarious.
